payload.contentString: {"version":1,"supplyOptionsType":"delivery","info_text":"He shall know your ways as if born to them."}
Life? Don't talk to me about life.
There's only one life-form as intelligent as me within thirty parsecs of here and that's me.
Am Anfang war das Nichts. Dann roundhousekickte Chuck Norris dieses Nichts und sagte: "Such‘ Dir einen Job!" Das ist die Geschichte der Entstehung des Universums.
Pardon me for breathing, which I never do anyway so I don't know why I bother to say it, Oh God, I'm so depressed.
Pardon me for breathing, which I never do anyway so I don't know why I bother to say it, Oh God, I'm so depressed.
{"version":1,"supplyOptionsType":"shipment","info_text":"And you, my son, are you one who gives or one who takes?"}

{"version":1,"supplyOptionsType":"delivery","info_text":"The Guild... they're fighting me in the mental vaults. They're behind everything. They fear the one who will come, who will know more, who will see more. The Guild is behind everything. It's not finished yet. I'm not formed."}
There's only one life-form as intelligent as me within thirty parsecs of here and that's me.
{"version":1,"supplyOptionsType":"onPremise","hint":"Jesus, George, it was a wonder I was even born."}

You think you've got problems? What are you supposed to do if you are a manically depressed robot? No, don't try to answer that. I'm fifty thousand times more intelligent than you and even I don't know the answer. It gives me a headache just trying to think down to your level.
Wenn Chuck Norris beim Russisch Roulette verliert, will er eine Revanche.
And then of course I've got this terrible pain in all the diodes down my left side.
There's only one life-form as intelligent as me within thirty parsecs of here and that's me.

{"version":1,"supplyOptionsType":"shipment","info_text":"Before I do your bidding, manling, I must cleanse the way between us. You've put a water burden on me that I'm not sure I care to support. But we Fremen pay our debts"}

{"version":1,"supplyOptionsType":"delivery","info_text":"Did you really think that you could bear the Kwisatz Haderach? The universe's super being? How dare you. My greatest student, and my greatest disappointment."}
Life? Don't talk to me about life.
{"version":1,"supplyOptionsType":"onPremise","hint":"Who the hell is John F. Kennedy?"}
Hallo, ich wollte gern fragen, ob das Medikament bei Ihnen vorraetig ist.
